Package com.app.springbackend.advice

Class TokenControllerAdvice

java.lang.Object
com.app.springbackend.advice.TokenControllerAdvice
@RestControllerAdvice public class TokenControllerAdvice extends Object
Handles the exception that occurs when there's a problem with the refresh token.

  • Method Details

    • handleTokenRefreshException

      @ExceptionHandler(TokenRefreshException.class) @ResponseStatus(FORBIDDEN) public ErrorMessage handleTokenRefreshException(TokenRefreshException e, org.springframework.web.context.request.WebRequest request)
      Handles TokenRefreshException. If such an exception occurs, this method returns a ErrorMessage with information about the error, including the HTTP status code, the timestamp when the exception occurred, the error message from the exception, and the description of the request during which the exception occurred.
      Parameters:
      e - the TokenRefreshException that occurred.
      request - the WebRequest during which the exception occurred.
      Returns:
      an ErrorMessage with details about the exception.
